name: Saboteur (itch) (Nuclear_Diamond)
description:
My entry to the 'Chain Reaction' Game Jam. You play as a saboteur in WW2 France, using your pipe bombs and saw to halt the Axis invasion by causing physics-based destruction. Includes a relatively advanced Finite State Machine based AI, stealth mechanics and physics destruction. The game will be in development after the jam is over.

Controls: Q&E to switch between bomb and saw, left click to use bomb or saw, right click to move to a position. Mouse wheel to zoom in and out.
